title: Binary ConversionBinary
extract: binary conversion. [′bīn·ə·rē kən′vər·zhən] (computer science) Converting a number written in binary notation to a number system with another base, such as decimal, octal, or hexadecimal.
extract_html: binary conversion. [′bīn·ə·rē kən′vər·zhən] (computer science) Converting a number written in binary notation to a number system with another base, such as decimal, octal, or hexadecimal.
